entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of showers with risk of a thunderstorm. High 16. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 24 April 2023
